title: GREAT LOCATION: Like New 3BR/2BA with FREE RENT!
posting_body: Special Offer - 1/2 off First Month's Rent - for 12-month lease starting 8/1/2022 or sooner!
Ask about the Sept 1 lease start offer
Newly rehabbed three-bedroom/two-bathroom duplex (two-story) apartment with luxury finishes in historic neighborhood.
Some pics are from another apartment and will be updated when unit complete.
Here is a video of the actual unit taken while tenants were living there (note: it is currently vacant, cleaned, painted and ready for move-in) https://youtu.be/r5pED4lySkg

Great East Village location with easy access to Division Blue Line stop (0.5 mi.), Chicago Avenue bars and restaurants (0.1 mi.), Division Street bars, restaurants, sidewalk cafes (0.4 mi.), Kennedy Expressway (< 1 mi.) and just over 1 mile to the 606 elevated trail.
The apartment features:
-Upgraded GE/Bosch appliances in stainless steel
-White solid wood cabinets with soft close and quartz countertops
-Stainless steel beverage fridge in kitchen

-Other kitchen features: Under cabinet lighting, subway tile backsplash, double bowl under mount sink with professional Kohler faucet plus dishwasher, disposal, ice-maker, filtered water dispenser, etc.
-Laundry room with HE washer and gas dryer
-Bedrooms all fit queen beds
-Nest thermostat
-Bluetooth speaker system in bathrooms
-Bedrooms all fit queen beds
-Smart building entry / answer visitor intercom from anywhere with app
-High speed internet (300Mbs+) with WiFi and ethernet jacks included.
Contact:
Text Brian to schedule.
$200/person move-in fee.
No security deposit.
$30/person application fee.
Listed by an Illinois Broker with an ownership interest.

Search Terms: Ukrainian Village, East Village, Wicker Park, Bucktown, West Town, West Loop, Randolph Street, Fulton Market, Noble Square, River West, Blue Line, Bloomingdale Trail, Brewery, Safe Neighborhood, Low Crime, High Transit Score
